verbs.description: at least two us attorneys general [V: are] investigating the google glitch that exposed hundreds of thousands of users personal data the investigation follows google announcement on monday that it would shut down the consumer version of its social network google and tighten its data - sharing policies after a bug potentially exposed user data that included names email addresses occupations genders and ages reuters google data protection commission attorneys general us
